meaning_str.bing:
v. 下沉；沉没；沉降；下陷
adj. 位于贫穷地区的；贫民窟的
n. 洗碗槽
网络. 水槽；洗涤槽；接收器

位于贫穷地区的；贫民窟的

下沉；使下沉；使沉没；沉没；降低；下陷；使失败；倒下挖；掘（深坑、深洞）；埋入；（高尔夫球）击球入洞；猛喝
水槽；（厨房里的）；洗碗槽；洼地；低洼地；沉降区；渗坑；汇集处
位于社会条件差的贫穷地区的；贫民窟的

1.en: Ships can take a lot of pounding. But just a few torpedoes will sink you. Watch out for submarine and torpedo bombers.
1.cn: 舰船很容易被鱼雷击沉，注意潜艇和鱼雷轰炸。

2.en: When we moved into a rental apartment a couple of years ago, werealized that ownership had been a burden, a time sink, and a money pit.
2.cn: 当我们两年前搬进一套租用的公寓时，我们认识到，业主身份早就是沉重的负担，随时沉没，而且还是一个填不满的钱坑。

3.en: Draco Malfoy was standing with his back to the door, his hands clutching either side of the sink, his white-blond head bowed.
3.cn: 德拉科·马尔福正背对着门站着，他的双手紧握着水槽的两边，他有着铂金色头发的脑袋低着。

0.cn: 你可以打翻东西啊，在水槽里。

1.en: In the restroom, ventilation panel above the sink. Cell phone detonator. Are we done？
1.cn: 在厕所水槽上方的通风板那，引爆器是手机，行了吗？

2.en: This camper van has everything. This button works the sink. Wow. And this button works the TV.
2.cn: 这辆露营车什么都有。这个按钮可以控制水槽。哇！这个按钮可以开电视。

3.en: George is going to fill the teapot with water. George has found a spider in the sink. George wants the spider to be his friend.
3.cn: 乔治要把茶壶灌满水，乔治在水槽里找到了蜘蛛，他想要蜘蛛做他的朋友。

4.en: Hey, so, Howard, what's the bathroom situation gonna be? Well, there's a sink out there that takes care of half your problems.
4.cn: 霍华德，所以我的浴室是怎么样？外面有个水槽，能帮你解决你一半的问题。

5.en: So, kitchen sink, cabinets are going in after the weekend. It's coming together, though. Shaping up really nice, don't you think?
5.cn: 厨房的水槽，还有橱柜周末后就会到。一起送过来的。目前一切进展顺利吧。

7.en: Put them over there in the sink.

8.en: Rocks have no fear. And they sink.
8.cn: 石头没有恐惧，但会沉下去。

9.en: And not in the sink. We each have special buckets.
9.cn: 而且还不能在水池子里洗，所以我们各有一个特制的小桶。

10.en: I refuse to sink to his level. You can't sink. With all that helium in you, you're lucky you don't float away.
10.cn: 我才不要堕落到他那种水准。你落不了，体内充满了氦气，遇水不飘走就算你走运啦。

11.en: I've come to find you, rubber ducky. I know where you are, you're in the sink. Oh. The rubber duck is not in the sink. I know, you are hiding under the table.
11.cn: 我马上就来找你了，橡皮鸭子。我知道你藏在哪里，你在水池里，没有。橡皮鸭子不在水池里，我知道了，你一定藏在桌子下面了。

12.en: Yeah, well, I've been looking for something to really sink my teeth into.
12.cn: 是的，好吧，我是来看看能不能找到一些我真正能下得去口的东西。

13.en: I'm going to pause to let that sink in. Okay, I think I understand. You do?
13.cn: 我暂停一下，以便你想一下。我想我听懂了。真的吗？

14.en: Let the U-boats sink the convoy. Look, it's been a big day maybe you're suffering from...
14.cn: 让德军潜艇攻击海军部。听着，今天发生了太多事情，也许你……

15.en: You'll drop them into the sea. Sink or swim. They're tied up! Exactly! Now there is context.
15.cn: 你要把他们扔进海里。或沉或游。他们被绑住了！没错，背景设置好了。

16.en: Did you buy generic ketchup, forget to rinse the sink, talk to him through the bathroom door?
16.cn: 你买了三无番茄酱？忘了洗水池？还是隔着厕所门同他讲话？

17.en: Bye, Plant. Bye, Chair number one. Bye, Chair number two. Bye, Table. Bye, wardrobe. Bye, sink. Bye-bye, Skylight.
17.cn: 拜拜，植物，拜拜，一号椅子，拜拜，二号椅子，拜拜，桌子，拜拜，衣柜，拜拜，洗手池，拜拜，天窗。

18.en: Back on the west coast, watch the sun sink into the North Pacific Ocean like a glowing ball of fire on Hapuna Beach.
18.cn: 回到西岸，在哈普那海滩上看着太阳如火球般的沉入北太平洋中。

19.en: Amazing. It floats. You sound surprised. Yes, usually they sink on the first go. Now we can go for our day on the river.
19.cn: 太神奇了，这艘船。你好像很惊讶嘛。是的，一般情况下第一次会沉下去的。现在，我们可以做着这个船去出游了。
